SELECT DATE_FORMAT( A.OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS OPER_DT , A.REP_ROUT_ID , C.VHC_ID , A.ROUT_ID , C.VHC_NO , A.GPS_X , A.GPS_Y , IFNULL(A.OPER_STS, "OS005") AS OPER_STS , B.REP_ROUT_NM , B.ROUT_NM , C.VHC_KIND , B.DEL_YN
FROM BMS_VHC_MST C LEFT JOIN BRT_CUR_OPER_INFO A ON C.VHC_ID = A.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST B ON A.ROUT_ID = B.ROUT_ID
AND C.VHC_KIND = #{CONTENT1}
AND C.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{CONTENT3}, '%')
ORDER BY C.VHC_ID

SELECT A.VHC_ID ,A.DVC_ID ,A.ORG_ID ,A.DVC_KIND ,A.DVC_COORDS ,A.INST_LOC ,A.DVC_IP ,A.MNG_ID ,A.DVC_TYPE ,A.DEV_SERIAL_NO ,A.MODEL_NM ,A.USE_YN ,A.CTR_YN ,A.REMARK ,B.ORG_NM ,C.DVC_COND ,DATE_FORMAT(C.SEND_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SEND_DATE
FROM BMS_DVC_INFO A LEFT JOIN BMS_ORG_MST B ON A.ORG_ID = B.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_DVC_COND_INFO C ON A.MNG_ID = C.MNG_ID
WHERE A.VHC_ID = #{VHC_ID} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'
ORDER BY A.DVC_KIND

SELECT a.ROUT_ID, a.LINK_ID, a.LINK_SN, a.MORN_STD, b.LINK_NM, b.ST_NODE_ID AS NODE_ID, b.ED_NODE_ID, c.NODE_TYPE, c.NODE_NM, c.GPS_X, c.GPS_Y, d.GPS_X AS ED_GPS_X, d.GPS_Y AS ED_GPS_Y, d.NODE_TYPE AS ED_NODE_TYPE, d.NODE_NM AS ED_NODE_NM FROM BMS_ROUT_LINK_CMPSTN a LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_LINK_MST b ON a.LINK_ID=b.LINK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_NODE_MST c ON b.ST_NODE_ID = c.NODE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_NODE_MST d ON b.ED_NODE_ID = d.NODE_ID WHERE a.ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID} ORDER BY a.LINK_SN
